content:
This future-gazing podcast series examines speculative scenarios and provocative prophecies

IN THIS episode we discuss what the future holds for the regulation of artificial intelligence. Is populism on the rise in Canada and will it impact Justin Trudeau’s chances of re-election? And does China’s new record-breaking bridge really bring it closer to Hong Kong? Anne McElvoy hosts.

ex: 网络 特鲁多；特澳博；特鲁多机场
adj. 人工的；人造的；假的；人为的
eg2: an artificial limb/flower/sweetener/fertilizer
假肢；假花；人造甜味剂；化肥
artificial lighting/light
人工照明；人造光
A job interview is a very artificial situation.
求职面试是一个相当不自然的场面。
the artificial barriers of race, class and gender
种族、阶级、性别的人为障碍
artificial emotion
假装的情感

ex: n. 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件

wp.Tourist Gaze: 游客凝视;旅游凝视;观光凝视;观光客的凝视

eg2: She lowered her head under his .
在他的注视下她低下了头。
Shift your .
转移你的注视。
As she speaks, her emotional gaze shifts from the ground, to my eyes, to the moonlit sky, to the ground, and back to my eyes again.
她说着话，那满溢着情感的凝视从地面移至我的双眼，移至月光闪耀的天空，移至地面，又回到我的双眼。

ex: n. 平民政治；民粹主义；民意论
网络 平民主义；民众主义；人民党主义
n. 预言；预言书；预言能力

wp.Doomsday Prophecy: 末日预言;末日卷轴;片;英文片名
wp.Orion Prophecy: 猎户星座的预言;猎户座预言;猎户星座的预言专辑;唱片名
wp.Prophecy Productions: 德国暗潮厂牌预言唱片;出版者;唱片公司

eg2: Whether the age ratio is a prophecy or fallacy, the importance of pension activity to markets is clear.
无论年龄比例是预言还是谬论,退休金活动对于市场的重要性显而易见.
I’ll start exercising when I have more energy… This one really does embody the term self fulfilling prophecy or vicious cycle.
我会开始锻炼，当我有更多的精力…… 这种幻想确实体现了一个长期自我实现的预言或恶性循环。
Before concluding this , Jesus gives us instruction to be ready, because it is going to happen when we are not expecting it.
在预言书结束前，耶稣给了我们如何做准备的指示，因为灾难会在我们意想不到的时候发生。

ex: adj. 刺激的，挑拨的；气人的
n. 刺激物，挑拨物；兴奋剂
eg2: On the other hand, these claims about the utility of unconsciousness, I think, are  and interesting.
另一方面，这些关于无意识功能的主张，是很具有煽动性很有趣的。
For a city in transition, billboards that urged buyers to "indulge" in a luxury sedan or "be a foreigner's landlord" became politically .
在一个转型中的城市，敦促买家“沉迷”豪华轿车或“成为外国人的房东”的广告牌变成政治上的刺激物。
The effect is often used in advertisement: asking the visitors unanswered and  questions advertisers often tend to force them to read the ad, click on the banner or follow a link.
这种效应经常用在广告上：广告主往往通过要求游客解答刺激的问题，来迫使他们阅读广告，点击横幅广告或者跟进一个链接。

wp.User scenario: 用户场景;户场景;户情景;使用模式
wp.Scenario Objectives: 剧本目标;本方针;多情景目标
wp.Scenario Simulation: 情景模拟;情境模拟;实境模拟;情节模拟法
wp.usage scenario: 使用场景;使用方案;使用方式情节
wp.clinical scenario: 临床场景;床情境;臨床场景;临床病案
wp.scenario method: 脚本法;场景法;情景法;情景分析方法
wp.Scenario Development: 前景规划;情境开发法;情景发展
wp.scenario template: 情节模板;脚本模板;情景模板;场景模板

ex: n. 方案；情节；剧本；设想
eg2: In this , a user retrieves data from the database with no locks.
在此方案中，用户从数据库中检索数据而不加任何锁。
I guess you wrote about this senior from , but it sounds like he presented, right?
我觉得你是从那个剧本里写出的这篇文章,但听起来像是他提出的，是么？
But we may not be able to do this for every .
但是我们不能每一种场景下都这么做。

wp.speculative investment: 投机性投资;		投机投资;性投资;进行投机投资
wp.speculative execution: 推测执行;预测执行;投机执行;猜测执行
wp.speculative metaphysics: 思辨的形而上学;思辩的形上学
wp.speculative bubbles: 投机泡沫;投机性泡沫;机泡沫
wp.speculative business: 投机事业;		投机商业;投机生意;险业务

ex: adj. 投机的；推测的；思索性的
eg2: So one of the things that agilists do we document stable concepts and not speculative concepts.
所以，敏捷人员所做的一件事就是为我们证明稳定的概念而非投机的概念。
There are plenty of ways to lose money, whether in speculative investments or through excessive fees in mutual funds.
有非常多损失资金的方法，无论是在投机的投资中或通过在基金中的，都会有额外费用。
But now suppose we approach the question from a -I don't say from an empirical point of view but from a speculative anthropological point of view.
现在假设我们从一个特定角度来看这个问题,我不会说从一个经验主义的角度,而是从一个推测的人类学的角度来看。

Title: What does the future hold for the regulation of AI?

paperStatistics.title: What does the future hold for the regulation of AI?
paperStatistics.desc: This future-gazing podcast series examines speculative scenarios and provocative prophecies
